# camera(framing:allowPitch:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a camera in the context of the map that frames the given map item.

## Declaration

```swift
func camera(framing item: MKMapItem, allowPitch: Bool = true) -> MapCamera
```

## Parameters

- **item**: The [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapItem] to frame.
- **allowPitch**: A Boolean value that indicates whether you can pitch the camera to frame the content.

## Return Value

Returns a [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MapCamera] with the framing region and pitch you specified.

## Creating a camera proxy

- **camera(framing:)**: Creates a camera in the context of the map that frames the given coordinate region.
- **camera(framing:)**: Creates a camera in the context of the map that frames the given map rectangle.
